Summary Note:
Møller Jespersen Kristensen and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Copenhagen. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
With a career spanning nearly 18 years, Møller Jespersen Kristensen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Møller Jespersen Kristensen is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Møller received his secondary school diploma from Ålborg Katedralskole in 1990.
Møller finished his studies at Copenhagen Business School in 2007.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 18 years, Møller Jespersen Kristensen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Møller Jespersen Kristensen launched his career as a Research Scientist at Novo Nordisk A/S, where he gained valuable experience from 2007 to 2011.
He then transitioned to Lundbeck A/S as a Clinical Trials Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2013 to 2018.
At Leo Pharma A/S, he worked as a Regulatory Affairs Director from 2020 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 1080000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited 39810000 DKK from his father, a well-known Corporate Lawyer, in 2009, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Møller as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
